text: Three ships of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary have borne the name RFA Cherryleaf: * was a tanker launched in 1916 as RFA Persol, renamed RFA Cherryleaf in 1917 and sold in 1947. * was a tanker launched in 1953 as Laurelwood. She was purchased by the RFA in 1959 and returned to her owners in 1966. * was a Leaf- class tanker launched in 1962 as Overseas Adventurer for a subsidiary of London & Overseas Freighters. She was bareboat chartered for the RFA in 1973 and returned to her owners in 1980. Category:Royal Fleet Auxiliary ship names
title: RFA Cherryleaf
